answers.answer: Depends, has the swelling been excessive or sudden? Swelling over time below the waist is normal but you should let your dr know about sudden swelling of the face or hands.

How is your blood pressure??? I had this happen suddenly with my first and went to the Hospital and found out it was severe preeclampsia and had to have an emergency c-section.  I hope that isnt in your case but I would def call your doc about it or doc on call.
My feet just got swollen all of a sudden now my head deals really heavy
I would def go to the doc sounds like it could be what I had. Plus its better to be safe than sorry!! Hope everything goes ok for you!
This sounds like preeclampsia.  Call your dr to be safe.

question: My due date is tomorrow I just noticed my feet nd face r swilling is that normal before labor
title: Swelling
